::Hot Rod/Jhiaxus/Scorponok::
   
  Hot Rod turns towards the voice of his old nemesis. He sees the form of his lover help captive. Hot Rod's fist instinct is to take aim with his blaster at Hydras. He then sees Trelos join them.
   
  Hot Rod: Let her go, Hydras! Things have been quiet lately with you predacons. Why choose now of all times to cause trouble. Don't you realize that Unicron is making his move?!
   
  The ground behind Hot Rod erupts as Scorponok comes flying out from under ground in scorpion mode. Zarak stand on top of the scorpion body.
   
  Zarak: Don't try and talk your way out of this one you old Targetmaster!
   
  Hot Rod is shocked at the voice and half turns so he can see both Hydras and Scorponok behind him.
   
  Hot Rod: Zarak! How are you alive? You should have died centuries ago!
   
  Zarak: My power was far too great for that...
   
  In the swamp Jhiaxus is seething with anger and hate. The Autobot that had caused him pain and his place in the Decepticon Empire was before him. His whole reason for coming to this mud ball.
   
  With careful aim Jhiaxus fires off a single shot that strikes Hot Rod's hand. Hot Rod is injured but his hand still functions. His blaster is scrap.
   
  Jhiaxus now slows stomps out of the swamp. In each hand he holding large automatic pistols.
   
  Hot Rod faces Hydras again.
   
  Hot Rod: What is this?!

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

Hydras tought that it was the right time, he Left his hidout and 
hissed pleased. He hold the clone, tied and gagged, in that was that 
its cover him. 

The clone moved weakly vagely imitating Nighlight's gestures.

"Hello old pal... It's nice that you decided Join us" 

Hydras trusted that the mistreated clone would be enought to let him 
manipulate Hot Rod

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod is now within the ambush area. He notices the near by 
swamp. The same swamp that Jhiaxus is hideing in. He also sees the 
torn up ground where Scorponok had burrowed.
> 
> Hot Rod: That's weird... What could have done that?
> 
> Hot Rod moves close to the burrow spot, studying it.
> 
> Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
> 
> > Hot Rod is having trouble locking downt he signal but it has 
> > stopped moving. Hot Rod sets the shuttle down not to distant from 
the
> > ambush spot. He steps out with a blaster in his right hand. He 
starts
> > to stalk forward towards the ambush.
> > 
> > Hot Rod: Nightlight? Nightlight, are you here?
> > 
> 
> > 
> > Hydras waited impatient that Hot Rod was a bit closser
> 
> Myrmidon was the stalking lion waiting in the shadows, vieled by 
nature
> and hidden by technology. 
> 
> Powerful senses focused on the approaching prey. Auditory senses 
took
> in the distinctive sounds of each step the Maximal made, his nose
> breathing in the smell of lubricant, he could almost taste the tinge
> metal of Hot Rod's armor as he moved toward them. 
> 
> Myrmidon's cybernetic muscles tensed as they prepared to leap as 
razor
> sharp claws were readied to strike, but he continued to wait ....
> 
> Preston
> (Myrmidon)
>
